name: Abra Kadabra, Citizen Abra
effect: Willpower 3 While an opponent has five or more cards in his hand, that opponent cannot discard cards to pay the cost of payment powers. Leader: KO a character adjacent to Abra Kadabra >>> Move Abra Kadabra to your hidden area or your visible area. Use this power only during the combat phase.

name: Air Strike
effect: Target character you control gets +2 ATK while attacking this turn and has flight this turn. You may replace a face-down resource you control. If you replaced a non-character card, that character gets an additional +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
"Get me in the air, John. I can do more good from up there."

name: All Too Easy
effect: Target Injustice Gang attacker you control gets +X ATK / -X DEF this attack, where X is the number of cards in target opponent's hand.
"I guess now we know who's quicker on the draw."

name: Amazo, Ivo's Android
effect: Amazo gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF for each character your opponents control.
"Fools! My absorption cells give me all of your powers!"

name: Aquaman, Arthur Curry
effect: Willpower 2 Aquaman gets +1 ATK / +2 DEF while each of your opponents has no cards in his KO'd pile. Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may remove target card in a KO'd pile from the game.

name: Aquaman, King of the Seven Seas
effect: Willpower 4 Leader: At the start of the combat phase, return a card from your KO'd pile to your hand for each character adjacent to Aquaman.
"I call upon the denizens of the deep! Answer your King's call!"

name: Atlantean Trident
effect: Equipped character gets +3 ATK. Whenever equipped character stuns a character, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on equipped character.
Sacred relic of Atlantis, symbol of royalty, weapon of the King.

name: Attend or Die!
effect: You may recruit Secret Society character cards from your KO'd pile this turn. If a character card would be put into your KO'd pile from play during the build phase this turn, instead, remove it from the game.
"Thanks for showing up... not that you had a choice."

name: Balance of Power
effect: Play Balance of Power only if an opponent has played a plot twist this attack. Target attacker gets -3 ATK this attack.
"That's right, Lantern. Savor your moment of victory."

name: Barry Allen as The Flash, Scarlet Speedster
effect: Whenever Barry Allen becomes powered-up while attacking a character, if Barry Allen is unequipped, you may ready him and he cannot cause breakthrough this turn.
"Two hundred bad guys? Give me a second."

name: Batman, Avatar of Justice
effect: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may discard a character card. If you do, negate target non-ongoing plot twist effect.
"The chess match has begun. We will force the move."

name: Batman, Hidden Crusader
effect: Concealed - Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.) While Batman is hidden, he gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF and has flight. Leader: While any player controlling a defender controls more resources than you do, attackers adjacent to Batman get +2 ATK / +2 DEF.

name: Bizarro Ray
effect: Ongoing: Pay 1 endurance >>> Target defender gets -1 DEF this attack. Then, if that defender has 0 DEF and you control a Revenge Squad character, stun that defender. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Bluejay, Jay Abrams
effect: Concealed - Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.) While Bluejay is hidden, he gets -1 ATK.
"Your world is a paradise, as was mine a long time ago."

name: Booster Gold, Michael Jon Carter
effect: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, that character gets an additional +1 DEF this attack. Boost 1: When Booster Gold comes into play, if you recruited him from your hand, gain 2 resource points.
"Have a seat and watch a real hero in action, Beetle!"

name: Bulletproof
effect: Target defender gets +1 DEF this attack and gets an additional +1 DEF this attack if you control four or fewer resources.
"Bullets . . . cute."

name: Bumblebee, Karen Beecher-Duncan
effect: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust Bumblebee. If you do, target player loses 3 endurance.

name: BWA HA HA HA HA!
effect: If you control four or fewer resources and a JLI character, negate target non-ongoing plot twist effect that targets a character.
"The joke's on you this time, pal!"

name: Captain Atom, Nathaniel Adam
effect: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) Boost 1: Captain Atom gets +3 ATK / +2 DEF this turn. Leader: Attackers adjacent to Captain Atom get +1 ATK for each attacker you control.

name: Captain Boomerang, "Digger"
effect: Captain Boomerang comes into play with a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on him. Remove a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter from Captain Boomerang >>> Target player loses 2 endurance.
The Flash thwarted "Digger's" first criminal scheme: stealing money from children.

name: Captain Boomerang, George Harkness
effect: Return Captain Boomerang to his owner's hand >>> Return target character with cost 2 or less to its owner's hand. Use this power only during your attack step.
"What goes around comes around, speedster. And it's coming for you."

name: Captain Cold, Leonard Snart
effect: Captain Cold comes into play with a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on him. Remove a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter from Captain Cold >>> Exhaust target character. Use this power only during your attack step.
"The temperature is about to drop . . . precipitously!"

name: Captain Marvel, Billy Batson
effect: Loyalty, Reservist Reveal and KO Captain Marvel >>> JLI attackers with cost 5 or greater you control get +4 ATK this attack. Use this power only if Captain Marvel is in your resource row.
"SHAZAM!"

name: Catherine Cobert, Embassy Chief
effect: While attacking a character, JLI team attackers you control get +1 ATK for each location you control.
"Welcome, mes beaux champions."

name: Charaxes, Killer Moth
effect: Whenever Charaxes stuns a character, you may put three character cards from your KO'd pile that share an affiliation with Charaxes on the bottom of your deck. If you do, KO that character.
"I'm the King of the Insect World!"

name: Chomin, Qwardian Spy
effect: Concealed - Optional Stun a character you control other than Chomin >>> Target player loses endurance equal to the cost of the character you stunned. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Circe, Immortal Sorceress
effect: Willpower 3 KO a character you control >>> Search your deck for an Army character card with cost 1, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only once per turn.
"Transform into the braying beasts you are!"

name: Connor Hawke as Green Arrow, Son of the Archer
effect: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, that character gets an additional +1 ATK this attack.

name: Conscription
effect: As an additional cost to play Conscription, discard a Manhunter character card. Search your deck for an Army character card with cost 1, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.
"Calm yourself, human. You're being improved."

name: Controller Sanction
effect: As an additional cost to play Controller Sanction, KO a resource you control. Target attacker you control cannot be stunned this attack. If that attacker has the Emerald Enemies affiliation, it gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the number of face-up resources you control.

name: Copperhead, Slithering Assassin
effect: Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.) Boost 1: Copperhead comes into play with a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on him.
"A snake strikes swiftly, silent and sure."

name: Counterstrike
effect: Target defender you control gets +3 ATK this attack. Whenever that defender stuns an attacker this turn, you may put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on that defender.
"You'll have to do better than that, sea monkey."

name: Counterterrorism
effect: Remove a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter from target character. If you do, you may put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target character you control.
"You are truly no longer an Atlantean, my brother!"

name: Creeping Doom, Army
effect: Exhaust two characters you control >>> Recover target stunned Army character with cost 1 you control.
"These tendrils are extensions of myself - my eyes, my ears, my fists."

name: Criminal Mastermind
effect: As an additional cost to play Criminal Mastermind, exhaust an Injustice Gang character you control. Ongoing: At the start of the build phase, each player draws a card.
"Your time is running out, Atom."

name: Crimson Fox, Vivian and Constance D'Aramis
effect: When Crimson Fox comes into play, if you control another JLI character, put a twin counter on her. While you control four or fewer resources, if Crimson Fox has a twin counter on her and would become stunned, instead, remove a twin counter from her and exhaust her.

name: Crisis on Infinite Earths, Team-Up
effect: Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, KO'd pile, and deck lose all team affiliations, have the Crisis affiliation, and cannot have any team affiliation other than Crisis. Character cards you own are not unique. Whenever you recruit a character, KO all characters you control with both the same name and version as that card.

name: Crystal Frost as Killer Frost, Cold-Hearted Killer
effect: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may remove three cards in your KO'd pile from the game. If you do, target character cannot ready this turn.
"Come here and let me cool down that burning heart, Firestorm."

name: Darkseid, Heart of Darkness
effect: Reservist Leader: KO a character adjacent to Darkseid >>> Target attacker or defender gets -X DEF this attack, where X is the cost of the character you KO'd. Use this power only once per turn.

name: David Clinton as Chronos, The Time Thief
effect: At the start of the recovery phase, you may return target character with cost 1 or less to its owner's hand. Whenever a character returns to an opponent's hand from play, each player draws a card.
"Been there, stole that."

name: Deadshot, Floyd Lawton
effect: Remove Deadshot from the game >>> KO target character with cost 3 or less. Use this power only during the combat phase and only if you have ten or more cards in your KO'd pile.
"Isn't it obvious? I kill people. For money!"

name: Death Times Five
effect: If target attacker would cause breakthrough while attacking a character this turn, instead, that character's controller loses 5 endurance.
"Met, matched, and defeated, once and for all."

name: Death Trap
effect: As an additional cost to play Death Trap, exhaust a character you control. Return target stunned character to its owner's hand.
"The only thing that pleases me more than your death is the knowledge that you will suffer."

name: Despero, Master of the Third Eye
effect: Willpower 3 When Despero comes into play, choose a character an opponent controls. Despero cannot be stunned by the chosen character this turn. Boost 2: When Despero comes into play, he gets +5 ATK / +5 DEF this turn.

name: Die for Darkseid!
effect: As an additional cost to play Die for Darkseid!, KO a character you control. Target player loses 4 endurance. If you played Die for Darkseid! from your resource row and you control a Darkseid's Elite character, you may replace a face-up non-ongoing plot twist.

name: Dinah Laurel Lance as Black Canary, "Pretty Bird"
effect: Ally: Whenever an attacker you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust target character.
Though her mother forbade it, Dinah followed in her footsteps, becoming the second Black Canary.

name: Dinah Laurel Lance as Black Canary, Blonde Bombshell
effect: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) While you control five or more resources, Dinah Laurel Lance gets -4 ATK.

name: Disband the League
effect: Ongoing: Return a JLA character you control to its owner's hand >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control. Use this power only once per turn.
"For now, the world is better off without a Justice League."

name: Divided We Fall
effect: Play Divided We Fall only during your attack step. You may stun a ready Secret Society character you control with cost greater than that of target character an opponent controls. If you do, ready that character and move it to your front row. At the start of the recovery phase, that character's owner moves it to his front row.

name: Dr. Destiny, John Dee
effect: Concealed, Willpower 5 Activate >>> Target player reveals his hand and loses 2 endurance for each character card he revealed. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"With my Materioptikon, I will control the Justice League from within their own dreams!"

name: Dr. Fate, Kent Nelson
effect: Loyalty, Reservist, Concealed - Optional, Willpower 8 Cosmic: Remove a cosmic counter from Dr. Fate >>> Target attacker or defender gets -8 ATK this attack. Leader: Characters adjacent to Dr. Fate have invulnerability and evasion.

name: Dr. Light, Light Shaper
effect: Exhaust X Army characters you control >>> Exhaust target character if its cost is less than X.
"I think you'll discover that this is more than just a harmless light show."

name: Dr. Sivana, Thaddeus Bodog Sivana
effect: Leader: At the start of the recovery phase, recover all stunned characters adjacent to Dr. Sivana.
"I am the rightful ruler of the Universe, and no teenaged brat is going to stop me!"

name: Elongated Man, Ralph Dibny
effect: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust Elongated Man. If you do, replace target non-Team-Up location or non-Team-Up ongoing plot twist.
If there's a mystery afoot, his nose knows.

name: Evan McCulloch as Mirror Master, Smoke and Mirrors
effect: Concealed - Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.) Pay 1 endurance >>> Return two target character cards from different KO'd piles to their owners' hands if they share the same cost. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Faith, "The Fat Lady"
effect: Willpower 2 Cosmic: Faith gets +2 willpower. Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may gain 1 endurance.
"Amen."

name: Fatality, Emerald Assassin
effect: Willpower 1 KO a resource you control >>> If you control four or fewer resources, negate target payment effect or non-ongoing plot twist effect. Use this power only once per turn.
"I will find you, John Stewart. And when I do, I will kill you."

name: Felix Faust, Infernal Dealmaker
effect: Willpower 3 When Felix Faust becomes stunned, you may KO him. If you do, put up to three Army character cards with cost 1 from your KO'd pile into your front row.
The cost of power is high . . . but easily paid.

name: Field of Honor
effect: Flip Field of Honor only during your recruit step and only if you control a JLA character. During each opponent's first attack in which he controls an attacker each turn, that opponent cannot play plot twists or use payment powers.

name: Fire, Beatriz DaCosta
effect: Ally: Whenever a JLI character you control becomes powered-up, target opponent loses 2 endurance. Boost 2: When Fire comes into play, if you don't control Ice, search your deck for a character card named Ice, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.

name: Firestorm, The Nuclear Man
effect: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may pay 3 endurance. If you do, draw a card.
Superman sponsored Firestorm for membership in the League after the boy made a name for himself fighting crime in New York City.

name: Floronic Man, Alien Hybrid
effect: When Floronic Man comes into play, you may return target non-Team-Up location to its owner's hand. If you do, that location's controller puts the top card of his deck face down into his resource row. Your opponents cannot flip locations.

name: Floronic Man, Jason Woodrue
effect: KO Floronic Man >>> Return target card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
Jason Woodrue mentored several promising young botanists, including Alec Holland, Susan Linden, and Pamela Isley.

name: Funeral For a Friend
effect: As an additional cost to play Funeral For a Friend, KO a character you control. Support row characters you control have reinforcement while defending this turn.
"He was the best of us all."

name: Funky Flashman, Salesman Supreme
effect: Leader: At the start of the combat phase, reveal the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of characters adjacent to Funky Flashman. Put a revealed Secret Society character card from among them into your hand and the remaining cards into your KO'd pile.
"Funky's fresh and feelin' fine!"

name: Funky's Big Rat Code, Team-Up
effect: Choose two team affiliations among characters you control. If you chose Secret Society and a different team affiliation, target player puts the top three cards of his deck into his KO'd pile. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile that have either of the chosen affiliations have both affiliations.

name: Gang-Up, Team-Up
effect: Choose two team affiliations among characters you control. If you chose Injustice Gang and a different affiliation, each player draws a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile that have either of the chosen affiliations have both affiliations.

name: General Fabrikant, Qwardian General
effect: Concealed - Optional While General Fabrikant is visible, hidden attackers you control cannot be stunned.
"We will strike from the shadows. They will never stand a chance."

name: Glass Jaw
effect: Target character gets -3 DEF while defending this turn. Whenever that character defends this turn, exhaust it.
"You mean Batman belted Guy and I missed it?!?"

name: Gorilla City
effect: Activate, put the top card of your deck into your KO'd pile >>> Target Secret Society attacker you control gets +1 ATK this attack, and an additional +2 ATK this attack if you have ten or more cards in your KO'd pile.
All of Grodd's plans are means to one end: returning to his homeland as King.

name: Gorilla Grodd, Simian Mastermind
effect: Willpower 3 Leader: KO a ready character adjacent to Gorilla Grodd >>> Move target character to your front row if its cost is less than that of the character you KO'd. If you do, ready the character you moved. Use this power only once per turn and only during the combat phase.

name: Guy Gardner, Egomaniac
effect: Willpower 4 Other characters you control get +1 willpower. Each JLI defender and Green Lantern defender you control gets +X DEF, where X is that character's willpower.
"You might as well call this the Wuss League without me in charge."

name: Gypsy, Cynthia Reynolds
effect: Concealed Return Gypsy to her owner's hand >>> Power-up target JLA attacker or defender you control.
"Sometimes it's those in the background who make the difference."

name: H'ronmeer's Curse
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your attack step, if you control a non-stunned character, each player stuns a non-stunned character he controls with cost 2 or less.
"For the weaker Martians, the curse is deadly."

name: Hal Jordan, Hard-Traveling Hero
effect: Willpower 5 At the start of the combat phase, the controller of target character with cost less than the total willpower of characters you control moves that character to a different position.
"You've got to look at the big picture, Ollie. It's about good and evil, right and wrong."

name: Hard-Light Storage Tank
effect: Hard-Light Storage Tank is not unique. When you flip Hard-Light Storage Tank, search your deck for an Army Injustice Gang character card with cost 1, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Whenever one or more Injustice Gang team attackers you control stun a defender, you may put an Army character card with cost 1 from your hand into your front row exhausted.

name: Hector Hammond, Mind Over Matter
effect: Willpower 2 Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may have the controller of target character move that character to a different position.
"You are my evolutionary inferior. Begone with you."

name: Henry King as Brainwave, Sinister Psionic
effect: Willpower 2 Leader: KO a character adjacent to Henry King >>> Target player loses endurance equal to the cost of the character you KO'd. Use this power only once per turn and only during the combat phase.
"I think, therefore you die!"

name: Hero's Welcome
effect: You may discard two cards. If you do, search your deck for a JLA character card and reveal it. If you reveal an ally character card, you may search your deck for another card with the same name and reveal it. Put all revealed cards into your hand and shuffle your deck.

name: High-Tech Flare Gun
effect: Transferable Equipped character gets +3 ATK and has range. Pay 1 endurance >>> Equipped character can attack hidden characters this turn.
"You can still run, but now you can't hide."

name: Ice, Tora Olafsdotter
effect: Ally: Whenever a defender you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust a character you control. If you do, target character cannot ready this turn.
Tora gave up being a princess to become a hero.

name: Identity Crisis
effect: Play Identity Crisis only during the combat phase. As an additional cost to play Identity Crisis, KO a character you control. Return all characters to their owners' hands.
"We will find who did this, Ralph."

name: Illusionary Warriors, Army
effect: Concealed Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust Illusionary Warriors. If you do, target character gets -2 ATK this attack.
"They can't all be real . . ."

name: Infernal Minions, Army
effect: Concealed - Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.) Whenever Infernal Minions becomes stunned, you may KO it. If you do, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target non-Army Injustice Gang character you control.
"Abnegazar, Rath, and Ghast... Our revenge, complete at last!"

name: Infestation
effect: Injustice Gang team attackers you control get +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack for each other team attacker you control.
"Let uzzzs zzzsee if The zzzSeven can zzzstand up to zzzseven thouzzzsand!"

name: Injustice Gang Satellite
effect: Activate, discard an Injustice Gang character card >>> KO target stunned character with cost less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's hand.
It lurks in the moon's shadow, glaring down on an unsuspecting world . . .

name: Insectoid Troopers, Army
effect: Insectoid Troopers gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF while team attacking.
"We zzzserve the Queen azzzs zzzshe demandzzzs."

name: IQ, Ira Quimby
effect: Willpower 1 Whenever an opponent draws a card, he loses 1 endurance.
"With every passing moment, another piece falls into place."

name: James Jesse as Trickster, Giovanni Giuseppe
effect: Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.) Whenever a character you control becomes stunned, put the top card of target player's deck into his KO'd pile.
"This is gonna be good!"

name: JLI Embassy
effect: JLI Embassy is not unique. At the start of the recovery phase, if you control four or fewer resources, you may discard a card. If you do, recover target stunned JLI character you control.
"Paris, London, Berlin . . . Justice is coming to a city near you."

name: John Henry Irons as Steel, Steel-Drivin' Man
effect: Reservist When John Henry Irons comes into play, you may put an equipment card with cost 1 or less from your hand or KO'd pile into play equipping target unequipped character you control. KO an equipment you control >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control.

name: John Stewart, Emerald Architect
effect: Willpower 4 Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, that character gets +2 willpower this attack.
"Do what you have to do, Kyle. I'll take care of things here until you get back."

name: Joseph Jones as General Glory, Lady Liberty's Champion
effect: Whenever three or more JLI team attackers you control stun a defender, KO that defender.
"Lady of Liberty, hear my plea- For the land of the brave- And home of the free!"

name: Justice League of Arkham, Team-Up
effect: Choose two team affiliations among characters you control. If you chose Arkham Inmates and another affiliation, each of your opponents discards a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile that have either of the chosen affiliations have both affiliations.

name: Justice League Signal Device
effect: Transferable At the start of the combat phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a JLA or JLI character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Justice League Task Force, Team-Up
effect: Choose two team affiliations among characters you control. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile that have either of the chosen affiliations have both affiliations. JLI team attackers you control get +1 ATK.

name: Kanjar Ro, Kylaq Defense Minister
effect: Leader: Characters adjacent to Kanjar Ro get +1 ATK and, if they are unaffiliated, they get +1 DEF.
"Peace is a costly thing. It must be paid for with the blood of our enemies."

name: Katar Hol as Hawkman, Thanagarian Enforcer
effect: Katar Hol gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF while equipped. Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, target character you control gets +2 ATK this attack while attacking a character with a higher cost or defending against a character with a higher cost.

name: Kelex, Faithful Servant
effect: When Kelex comes into play, you may discard two cards or a Team Superman character card. If you do, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Sure Big Blue, I'll feed Krypto just as soon as I'm done tricking out the PZP."

name: Kimiyo Hoshi as Dr. Light, Starlight Sentinel
effect: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) While an opponent controls six or more resources, team attackers you control get +3 ATK.

name: Kooey Kooey Kooey
effect: KO Kooey Kooey Kooey >>> If you control four or fewer resources and a JLI character, search your deck for a card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"It was a great island getaway . . . until it got up and walked away."

name: L-Ron, Robot Companion
effect: While you control a location, L-Ron gets +1 ATK. Pay 1 endurance >>> KO a resource you control. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Lair of the Mastermind
effect: Characters you control can team attack as though they had all team affiliations. Activate >>> Target unaffiliated defender you control has reinforcement this attack.
"Every mad scientist needs a quiet place to get away from it all."

name: Lead by Example
effect: Target attacker you control gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack. If that character is a leader character, instead, it gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack for each ready character adjacent to it.

name: Lex Luthor, Criminal Genius
effect: Leader: Characters adjacent to Lex Luthor have the Secret Society and Revenge Squad affiliations. Exhaust a character adjacent to Lex Luthor >>> Lex Luthor gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this turn. Use this power only during the combat phase.
Luthor is never lacking for a lackey.

name: Lex Luthor, Evil Incorporated
effect: Ally: Whenever an Injustice Gang or Revenge Squad character you control becomes powered-up, you may return target stunned character to its owner's hand.
"The devil's in the details."

name: Lex Luthor, Nefarious Philanthropist
effect: At the start of the build phase, each of your opponents draws two cards. If he does, that opponent cannot play more than one plot twist this turn. Leader: Characters adjacent to Lex Luthor have the Injustice Gang affiliation.
Every deal has a downside.

name: Libra, Alien Conqueror
effect: Leader: Characters your opponents control get -X ATK, where X is the number of characters adjacent to Libra. KO three characters adjacent to Libra >>> Ready Libra. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"I look for three things in a minion - loyalty, ferocity, and disposability."

name: Look-Alike Squad
effect: Ongoing: Character cards named Superman are not unique. Whenever a character you control named Superman becomes stunned, you may KO it. If you do, you may put a character card named Superman with cost lower than the cost of the KO'd character from your hand into your front row.

name: Mageddon, Weapon of Universal Destruction
effect: Whenever a character an opponent controls leaves play, that opponent loses the game.
Every civilization has a name for it - the Anti-Sun, the Primordial Annihilator, the Old Dragon, the Ultimate Warbringer. On New Genesis, it is called Mageddon.

name: Magnificent Seven
effect: Power-up target JLA or JLI attacker or defender you control. If you control four or fewer resources, draw a card.
"For truth." "For peace." "For justice."

name: Manhunter Clone, Clone of Paul Kirk
effect: Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.) Manhunter Clone is not unique. Whenever Manhunter Clone becomes stunned, put the top card of target player's deck into his KO'd pile.

name: Manhunter Conqueror, Grandmaster
effect: When Manhunter Conqueror comes into play, ready all Army characters you control. Exhaust an Army Manhunter character you control >>> Target player loses 1 endurance.

name: Mantis, Power Parasite
effect: Mantis gets +1 ATK for each other character you control. At the start of the combat phase, you may put an Army character card with cost 1 from your hand into your front row.
"Go, my bugs! Bring down the gods who have oppressed you!"

name: Mark Desmond as Blockbuster, Mindless Brute
effect: While you have ten or more cards in your KO'd pile, Mark Desmond cannot be stunned while attacking and gets +4 ATK.
"RRRRAAAAWWWGGGG!!!"

name: Martian Manhunter, J'onn J'onzz
effect: Concealed - Optional, Willpower 4 Pay 2 endurance >>> Move Martian Manhunter to your hidden or visible area. Leader: Defenders adjacent to Martian Manhunter have reinforcement and get +2 ATK.

name: Martian Manhunter, Manhunter from Mars
effect: Concealed - Optional, Willpower 6 Discard a card >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control. Leader: At the start of the combat phase, draw two cards for each character with willpower 1 or greater adjacent to Martian Manhunter.

name: Matter Convergence
effect: Move target character you control with concealed to your hidden area. If that character has the Anti-Matter affiliation, it gets +3 ATK while attacking this turn.
Two Universes, positive and negative, eternally bound in a struggle for supremacy.

name: Maxima, Empress of Almerac
effect: Maxima has the team affiliations of each character you control. Maxima gets +1 ATK for each ongoing plot twist you control.
"That's a good boy."

name: Maxwell Lord, Financier
effect: When Maxwell Lord comes into play, you may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for a Team-Up card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Everything is going according to plan."

name: Membership Drive
effect: Whenever you recruit a character with cost 2 or greater this turn, it comes into play with a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on it.
"Hey, you got powers? You look like you got powers."

name: Metamorpho, Rex Mason
effect: Whenever Metamorpho attacks or defends, you may choose one: Metamorpho gets -2 ATK / +2 DEF this attack; or Metamorpho gets +2 ATK / -2 DEF this attack.
Rex has the power to transform into any element found within the human body.

name: Midnight Cravings
effect: Target character gets -1 DEF and -3 willpower this turn.
"Mmmm . . . cookies."

name: Mobius Chair
effect: Unique Equipped character gets +1 DEF and has flight. KO Mobius Chair >>> Move target New Gods character you control with cost 3 or greater to your hidden area or your visible area.

name: Mogo, The Living Planet
effect: Reservist, Willpower 8 While Mogo is visible and in your front row, support row characters you control cannot be attacked.
Mogo still doesn't socialize.

name: Monitor Womb Station
effect: Monitor Womb Station is not unique. When you flip Monitor Womb Station, name a plot twist with cost 1 or less. While you control a non-stunned JLA character, your opponents cannot play the named card.

name: Mysterious Benefactor
effect: As an additional cost to play Mysterious Benefactor, exhaust a Secret Society character you control. Search your deck for a leader card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"You will find I do not abide incompetence."

name: Neron, Soul Collector
effect: Willpower 5 Leader: At the start of the combat phase, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on each character adjacent to Neron. Whenever a character adjacent to Neron becomes stunned during the combat phase, KO that stunned character.

name: New Era
effect: As an additional cost to play New Era, reveal a JLA character card from your hand. KO a location you control. If you do, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, put it face down into your resource row, and shuffle your deck.
"Looks like it's time for a new base."

name: Not on My Watch
effect: Play Not on My Watch only if you control a character with two or more team affiliations. Choose one: Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist with cost 1 or less; or target protected defender you control has invulnerability this attack.

name: Nth Metal
effect: Whenever equipped character attacks or defends, you may power-up that character.
Though antiquated in appearance, these weapons are among the most advanced in the universe.

name: Oberon, Micro Manager
effect: Loyalty Activate >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control.
"Short jokes. How original."

name: Ocean Master, Son of Atlan
effect: Discard two cards >>> Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target Injustice Gang character you control.
"I am not the weakling I once was, King of Atlantis!"

name: Oliver Queen as Green Arrow, Emerald Archer
effect: Reservist, Willpower 1 Pay 2 endurance >>> KO target character with cost 1 or less. Use this power only once per turn.
"I never aim, but then again, I never miss."

name: Oliver Queen as Green Arrow, Hard-Traveling Hero
effect: Willpower 1 Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust Oliver Queen. If you do, stun target character with cost 3 or less.
"Sometimes you forget that we're not just saving stars, Hal . . . We're saving people."

name: Philosopher's Stone
effect: Unique Equipped character gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF. Whenever equipped character causes breakthrough to a player, if it has the Injustice Gang affiliation, name a non-character card. Search that player's deck for all cards with the same name as that card and remove them from the game.

name: Plasma Blast
effect: Target defender gets -1 ATK / -1 DEF this attack. If you control four or fewer resources and a JLI character, that defender gets an additional -2 ATK / -2 DEF this attack.
"Russian Science: 1 Western Armor: 0"

name: Plastic Man, Eel O'Brian
effect: Evasion At the start of the combat phase, Plastic Man gets +X ATK this turn, where X is the tens digit of your endurance, and +Y DEF this turn, where Y is the ones digit of your endurance.
"XYXY!? Is this a game or a chromosome test?"

name: Poison Ivy, Deadly Rose
effect: KO another character you control >>> KO a resource you control. If you do, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, put it face down into your resource row, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only once per turn.
"Green always was my favorite color."

name: Poison Ivy, Kiss of Death
effect: Activate >>> Choose one: Recover target stunned character an opponent controls with cost 2 or less and move it to your support row; or KO target stunned character.
"Looks like something wicked is blooming."

name: Poisoned!
effect: Target character gets -1 ATK this turn. You may put a plague counter on that character if you control a League of Assassins character.
"The Detective is, after all, only a man."

name: Power Girl, Karen Starr
effect: Cosmic: While protecting a character, Power Girl gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF.
"What's the matter, boys? Aren't you happy to see me?"

name: Power Siphon
effect: Exhaust target Injustice Gang defender you control. If you do, it gets -X ATK / +X DEF this attack, where X is the number of cards in target opponent's hand.
"Before I take your lives, I want to see you crawl!"

name: Professor Ivo, Anthony Ivo
effect: Evasion When Professor Ivo comes into play, you may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for an unaffiliated character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"To eternity! And the demise of the Justice League!"

name: Prometheus, Darker Knight
effect: Discard an Injustice Gang character card >>> Target attacker or defender gets -2 DEF this attack. Use this power only once per attack.
"I know every mistake you'll ever make."

name: Psycho-Pirate, Roger Hayden
effect: At the start of the combat phase, you may remove up to six cards in your KO'd pile from the game. If you do, move target character to your front row if its cost is less than or equal to the number of cards you removed this way.
"If you only knew what I know . . ."

name: Quadromobile
effect: Unique Quadromobile costs 1 less to recruit while you control a Secret Society character. Equipped character gets +2 ATK and has flight. KO Quadromobile >>> Return target character or location card from a KO'd pile to its owner's hand.

name: Quakemaster, Robert Coleman
effect: Activate >>> Replace target non-Team-Up location. Use this power only if you control another Secret Society character.
"Let's do the best kind of damage: property damage!"

name: Queen of Fables, Wickedest Witch
effect: Activate >>> Replace target non-Team-Up ongoing plot twist. If you do, search your deck for an Army character card with cost 1, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.
"Mirror, mirror, on the wall, let me watch these heroes fall."

name: Rallying Cry!
effect: Target character you control gets +2 ATK / +1 DEF while attacking this turn and has range this turn.
"Now is the time, this is the place. Here is where we make our stand!"

name: Rama Khan, Elemental Magician
effect: Willpower 5 Locations you control have "Activate >>> Power-up target attacker or defender you control. Use this power only once per turn."
"You mortals and your so-called strength are insignificant as dust to the mountain that is Jarhanpur."

name: Ray Palmer as The Atom, World's Smallest Hero
effect: Concealed Return Ray Palmer to his owner's hand >>> Negate target effect targeting a JLA character you control.
Thanks to a suit that allows him to shrink to microscopic size, Ray fights battles that no one else can.

name: Recharge the Sun
effect: You may stun any number of characters you control with total willpower greater than the cost of target Green Lantern character. If you do, ready that character.
In his final moments, Hal Jordan remembered what he always was . . . a hero.

name: Red Tornado, John Smith
effect: If a team attacker you control would become stunned, instead, you may stun Red Tornado. If Red Tornado would be put into a KO'd pile from play, instead, you may return him to his owner's hand.
"Stand behind me. My android body can sustain damage better than your organic forms."

name: Reform the League
effect: Ongoing: Discard a character card >>> Power-up target JLA attacker or defender you control. Use this power only once per turn.
An ever-changing roster gives the League the diversity it needs to defend the world from a multitude of threats.

name: Remoni-Notra as Star Sapphire, Zamoran Champion
effect: Willpower 3 Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may exhaust a character you control. If you do, you may return a resource you control to its owner's hand.
"Only the Lantern is worthy of my full attention."

name: Resistance is Useless
effect: Target attacker you control gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack and an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack if it is unaffiliated.
"You will join us. There is no escape."

name: Rocket Red #4, Dmitri Pushkin
effect: Activate >>> Rocket Red #4 gets +1 DEF this turn for each resource you control. Activate >>> Rocket Red #4 gets +1 ATK this turn for each resource you control. Boost 1: When Rocket Red #4 comes into play, ready him.

name: Roll Call!
effect: Gain 1 endurance for each JLA character you control. If you control two or more JLA characters, draw two cards, then discard two cards.
"So, who's on the team this week?"

name: Royal Egg-Matrix
effect: Activate >>> Return an Army Injustice Gang character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
"Riszzze my drone! Riszzze and protect your Queen!"

name: Running Interference
effect: As an additional cost to play Running Interference, exhaust a non-defending JLI character you control. Exhaust target protected defender you control and remove all attackers from this attack.

name: S.T.A.R. Labs Orbital Platform
effect: S.T.A.R. Labs Orbital Platform is not unique. Activate >>> Target protected attacker or defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack.

name: Safety in Numbers
effect: Play only if you control three or more JLI team attackers. Ready target attacker you control. That attacker cannot be stunned this attack.
"One thing's for sure, he can't take us all down!"

name: Sam Scudder as Mirror Master, Reflective Rogue
effect: Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may draw a card and discard a card.
"It may not be PC, but stealing sure is fun!"

name: Satellite HQ
effect: Activate >>> Characters you control with cost 4 or greater can attack hidden characters this turn. Activate >>> Target JLA attacker gets +X DEF this attack, where X is its willpower.
"It is not enough to protect America. We must protect the world."

name: Scarecrow, Fearmonger
effect: Whenever Scarecrow stuns a character, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on him. At the start of the combat phase, you may remove a counter from target character. If you do, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target character you control.
"BOO!"

name: Scarecrow, Psycho Psychologist
effect: Pay 3 endurance >>>Target player loses X endurance, where X is the number of cards in his hand. Use this power only during the combat phase and only once per turn. Boost 1: When Scarecrow comes into play, each opponent draws three cards. Put three +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on Scarecrow.

name: Scott Free as Mister Miracle, Man of a Thousand Escapes
effect: Evasion Ally: Whenever a character with cost 3 or less you control becomes powered-up, that character has invulnerability this turn.
Son of the Highfather, exile of New Genesis, heir to an Empire.

name: Secret Files
effect: Play Secret Files only if you control an Injustice Gang character. Each player searches his deck for an affiliated character card, reveals it, puts it into his hand, and shuffles his deck.
"There are many economies to trade in, but the most dangerous is secrets."

name: Secret Origins
effect: You may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for a character card with cost equal to that of the greatest-cost character any opponent controls, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"You see, son, you've got a lot to live up to."

name: Secret Sanctuary
effect: Activate, exhaust any number of JLA characters you control >>> Return target character card from your KO'd pile to your hand if its cost is less than or equal to the total willpower of the characters you exhausted.

name: Shadow-Thief, Carl Sands
effect: Concealed When Shadow-Thief comes into play, search your deck for an Army character card with cost 1, put it into your front row, and shuffle your deck.
While safe in the shadow-dimension, Carl Sands projects his dark avatar into the real world.

name: Shake it Off
effect: Target defender gets +1 DEF this attack. If that character is an ally character, instead, you may power-up that defender.

name: Shayera Thal as Hawkwoman, Thanagarian Enforcer
effect: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up, you may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for a character card named Katar Hol or an equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Silver Sorceress, Laura Cynthia Neilsen
effect: Willpower 2 At the start of your attack step, if you control four or fewer resources, the controller of target unprotected character moves it to his hidden area. At the start of the recovery phase, that character's controller moves it to his visible area.

name: Sinestro, Corrupted by the Ring
effect: Willpower 1 Sinestro costs 2 less to recruit while an opponent controls six or more resources. Sinestro gets +1 ATK and +1 willpower for each face-up resource your opponents control.
"I am no mere Lantern! I AM A GOD!!!"

name: Sinister Citadel
effect: Sinister Citadel is not unique. KO a character you control >>> Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target leader character you control. Use this power only once per turn. Activate >>> Remove a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter from a character you control. If you do, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target Secret Society character you control.

name: Slaughter Swamp
effect: Activate, discard a card >>> Return target character card from a KO'd pile to its owner's hand. Whenever you recruit a Secret Society character with cost 3 or greater, ready Slaughter Swamp.

name: Snapper Carr, Cool Daddy-O
effect: Equipped JLA defenders you control have reinforcement. Activate >>> Power-up target equipped attacker or defender you control.
"This looks like a happenin' scene."

name: Solomon Grundy, Buried on Sunday
effect: Solomon Grundy gets +3 ATK / +3 DEF while defending against a single character. While you have no cards in your deck, Solomon Grundy cannot leave play, and if he would become stunned, instead, move him to your hidden area.

name: Sorcerer's Treasure
effect: As an additional cost to play Sorcerer's Treasure, discard a Secret Society character card. Choose a plot twist card in your KO'd pile. You may play that card from your KO'd pile this turn. Whenever you do, remove that card from the game.
"Now for some real power!"

name: Staged Attack
effect: Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack. If that defender has the JLI affiliation and cost 4 or less, it has invulnerability this attack.
"Max, I've heard of war games, but this is ridiculous."

name: Starro the Conqueror, Intergalactic Starfish
effect: When Starro the Conqueror comes into play, put any number of Army characters with cost 1 from your hand into your front row. KO X Army characters you control >>> Move target character to your front row if its cost is less than X.
It controls. It consumes. It conquers.

name: Straight to the Grave
effect: Search your deck for a character card and put that card into your KO'd pile. If you control a Secret Society character, in addition, search your deck for a non-character card and put that card into your KO'd pile. Shuffle your deck.

name: Sue Dibny, Charismatic Coordinator
effect: When Sue Dibny comes into play, you may search your deck for a JLA or JLI character card with cost 2, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"The boys need to get used to a girl running their little clubhouse."

name: Superman, Avatar of Peace
effect: Ally: Whenever a protected character you control becomes powered-up, it has invulnerability this attack. Leader: Characters adjacent to Superman have flight.
"I asked you to stand down, but you've given me no other option."

name: T. O. Morrow, Thomas Oscar Morrow
effect: Pay 1 resource point >>> Non-Army character cards with cost 2 instead cost you 1 resource point to recruit this turn.
"My creations will bring about the end of the Justice League!"

name: Tasmanian Devil, Hugh Dawkins
effect: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) Tasmanian Devil gets +1 ATK for each resource your opponents control.
"I've got my father's eyes and my mother's claws."

name: Tattooed Man, Living Ink
effect: Willpower 2 Tattooed Man comes into play with two +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on him. Remove any number of +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters from Tattooed Man >>> For each counter you removed, search your deck for an Army character card with cost 1 and put it into your front row. Shuffle your deck. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Ted Kord as Blue Beetle, Heir of the Scarab
effect: Activate, discard a card >>> Search your deck for a card named Booster Gold or an equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"When you see a real hero, Booster, you let me know."

name: Teleport Tube
effect: Play Teleport Tube only if you control a JLA attacker. Remove all attackers you control from this attack and ready them.
Even the mightiest hero needs an exit strategy.

name: The Castle
effect: Activate >>> Target JLI defender with cost 4 or less has reinforcement this attack.
"Our base is haunted by a wandering suit of armor? And who thought this was a good idea?"

name: The Creeper, Jack Ryder
effect: Evasion Whenever The Creeper recovers, draw a card. The Creeper has the team affiliations of each character you control.
"They killed me. Then they brought me back. They should have quit while they were ahead."

name: The General, Wade Eiling
effect: At the start of the combat phase, target character loses leader and all leader powers this turn. Whenever The General becomes stunned, if he is in your front row, you may discard an Injustice Gang character card. If you do, recover him and move him to your support row.

name: The Joker, Headline Stealer
effect: Each opponent cannot play plot twists from his hand with cost less than the number of cards in his hand.
"Enough about me. Let's talk about me!"

name: The Mist, Jonathan Smythe
effect: Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.) Whenever The Mist becomes stunned during the combat phase, you may have target opponent move a non-stunned visible character he controls to his hidden area.

name: The Plunder Plan
effect: Put up to three Secret Society character cards from your KO'd pile on the bottom of your deck. Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack for each card you put on the bottom of your deck.
Step 1. Grab stuff. Step 2. Cheese it. Step 3. Profit.

name: The Shark, Karshon
effect: Willpower 2 While an opponent has five or fewer cards in his hand, The Shark gets -2 ATK / -1 DEF.
"Surface dwellers make great snacks."

name: The Watchtower
effect: Activate, discard a card >>> Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed JLA character card from among them into your hand and the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.
The Magnificent Seven built the JLA's moon base after defeating the Hyperclan.

name: The Wizard, William Zard
effect: Willpower 1 Leader: Exhaust a character adjacent to The Wizard >>> Target player puts the top card of his deck into his KO'd pile. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"You will find I have far more than simple parlor tricks up my sleeve."

name: Token Resistance
effect: Ongoing: Exhaust a character you control that is protecting a character >>> Target character gets -1 ATK this turn.
"I've heard of wading through the enemy, but . . ."

name: Tomorrow Woman, Trojan Telepath
effect: When Tomorrow Woman comes into play, you may move her to target opponent's front row. Cosmic: At the start of the combat phase, discard a card.
Created by T. O. Morrow to infiltrate the JLA, she went beyond her programming and became a hero.

name: Trial by Fire
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack and an additional +2 ATK this attack if you control four or fewer resources.
"Your shapeshifting tricks will not help you, imbecile!"

name: Ultra-Humanite, Evolutionary Antecedent
effect: Willpower 4 Whenever Ultra-Humanite stuns a character with cost less than or equal to his willpower, you may move that character to your front row. Leader: Attackers adjacent to Ultra-Humanite get +1 ATK for each non-Army character you control.

name: UN Building, Team-Up
effect: When you flip UN Building, choose three different team affiliations among characters you control. If you chose three different team affiliations, characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile that have any of the chosen affiliations have all of those affiliations.

name: UN General Assembly
effect: You may exhaust a JLI character you control. If you do, search your deck for a character card with two or more team affiliations, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"And on this day, the United Nations recognizes the Justice League as its sanctioned peace-keeping force."

name: UN Recognition
effect: Target JLI defender you control gets +3 ATK this attack. Whenever an attacker becomes stunned this attack, gain 3 endurance.
Maxwell Lord orchestrated an attack on the UN, giving his JLI the chance to save the day.

name: Valkyra, Valkyrie of New Genesis
effect: Cosmic: Valkyra gets +2 DEF. Leader: Attackers with cosmic adjacent to Valkyra get +3 DEF.
"Your will is strong, Orion, but it is nothing without training."

name: Vicarious Living
effect: As an additional cost to play Vicarious Living, discard a character card. Search your deck for a character card with cost equal to the cost of the card you discarded, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"I love this show."

name: Wall of Will, Construct
effect: Exhaust target JLA defender you control. If you do, lose 3 endurance and that defender gets +X DEF this attack, where X is its willpower.
"Don't worry. Architects build things to last."

name: War Without End
effect: As an additional cost to play War Without End, exhaust a Manhunter character you control. Recover each character you control with the same cost as that of the character you exhausted.
Where one falls, two rise.

name: Wheel of Misfortune
effect: Negate target power-up effect. You may power-up an unaffiliated attacker or defender you control.
"Congratulations, Flash! You're our unlucky winner!"

name: With Prejudice
effect: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Target character you control gets +1 ATK this turn for each Secret Society character card you revealed. Put all revealed character cards into your KO'd pile and all other revealed cards on the bottom of your deck.
"One Leaguer down . . . six to go."

name: Wonder Woman, Avatar of Truth
effect: Willpower 3 Cosmic: At the start of the combat phase, each opponent names a plot twist. Each opponent cannot play plot twists this phase with names different from the name he chose.
"The Golden Perfect is a circle because truth has no beginning and no end."

name: Wonder Woman, Princess Diana
effect: Willpower 4 Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Wonder Woman attacks or defends, if this is the first time that character has attacked or defended this turn, power-up that character.
"On Themiscyra, we are all warriors-born."

name: World War III
effect: Play World War III only during your attack step. KO any number of non-stunned Injustice Gang characters you control, then KO any number of characters with combined cost less than the number of characters you KO'd.
Mageddon's approach amplified the world's hostilities.

name: World's Greatest Heroes, Team-Up
effect: Play only if you control a JLA character and a JLI character. Draw a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile with either the JLA or JLI team affiliation have both affiliations. World's Greatest Heroes cannot be the target of effects your opponents control.

name: Zatanna, Zatanna Zatara
effect: Willpower 5 When Zatanna comes into play, you may put a cosmic counter on target character with cosmic you control. Cosmic: Whenever Zatanna attacks or defends, power-up Zatanna.
"Stibbar dna sevod tuo fo tah!"

name: Zauriel, Guardian Angel
effect: Willpower 3 Activate, return Zauriel to its owner's hand >>> Recover target stunned character you control. Cosmic: Zauriel gets +2 ATK.
Zauriel left Heaven to fight for Earth.

name: Zazzala as Queen Bee, Royal Genetrix
effect: Concealed - Optional At the start of the recovery phase, you may put an Army character card with cost 1 from your hand into your front row. Leader: Army team attackers with cost 1 adjacent to Zazzala cannot be stunned.
"Onwardzzzs to victory!"
